Abstract: Children at Amistad Academy in New Haven, a charter school that serves mostly poor black and Latino students, make drawings showing how they will live when they are 20 years old; photos (M)
Snippet: Children at Amistad Academy in New Haven, a charter school that serves mostly poor black and Latino students, make drawings showing how they will live when they are 20 years old; photos (M)
LeadParagraph: TWO women playing tennis under a star-filled sky, trading volleys for a chance to win a trip to the moon. Three malformed animals trying to destroy a tree that has taken away people's lives and is threatening their master. Pokemon saving the human race from a trio of volcanoes erupting at the same time.

Headline.Main: Through the Eyes of Children, a More Friendly Future
Headline.PrintHeadline: VISIONS: TECHNOLOGY; Through the Eyes of Children, a More Friendly Future
